text: Mary Shelley, also known as A Storm in the Stars, is a 2017 biographical drama movie directed by Haifaa al-Mansour and starring Elle Fanning, Douglas Booth, Tom Sturridge, Bel Powley, Stephen Dillane, Maisie Williams, Joanne Froggatt, Derek Riddell, Hugh O'Connor. ==Other websites== * * Category:2017 drama movies Category:2010s biographical movies Category:British biographical movies Category:British drama movies Category:Luxembourgian biographical movies Category:Luxembourgian drama movies Category:American biographical movies Category:American drama movies Category:Irish biographical movies Category:Irish drama movies Category:Australian biographical movies Category:Australian drama movies Category:Movies directed by Haifaa al-Mansour Category:Movies based on actual events
title: Mary Shelley (movie)
